DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness newly develop interdisciplinary nurse-coordinated AF expert program primary care patient . Therefore prospective , pragmatic cluster randomize control trial perform general practice .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Interdisciplinary , Nurse-coordinated Atrial Fibrillation Expert Program Primary Care Patients
DOC.criteria: Every newly diagnose AF patient . Every AF patient see cardiologist electrophysiologist past 2 year inclusion . AF must confirm electrocardiogram . Capable provide write informed consent . Dutch speak verbally testable , without cognitive impairment . AF patient receive arrhythmologic consult AF prior start study . AF patient systematic followup cardiologist prior start study . Terminally ill AF patient Participation another clinical trial
